location.parking: Park on road by Strines Church - 30 second walk away

bus.description: The 358 bus (Stockport - Offerton - Marple - New Mills - Hayfield) stops within 30 seconds of our door

train.connections: Direct trains to/from Romily, Marple, and New Mills Central

details.description: A special playdate just for dads and their little ones!

faq.a: This event is specifically for dads and their children to promote father-child bonding time.

faq.q: Will there be women organisers present?
faq.a: Yes, Jen will be helping host the event with Tim and James.

location.parking: Park on road by Strines Church - 30 second walk away

details.description: We're hosting a baby and toddler playdate at our house, and you're invited!

faq.a: Yes, siblings are welcome! Our space and activities are best suited for ages 0-3, but we understand if you need to bring older children.
